mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_CATEGORY from product group by PRODUCT_CATEGORY
SELECT COUNT(*) as "COUNT" from product where status = 'Y'

select PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, COMPANY, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, INVENTORY, INGREDIENT, ORIGIN, PRODUCT_WEIGHT, KCAL, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "ENROLL_DATE", TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "MODIFY_DATE" from product p where status ='Y' order by PRODUCT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, COMPANY, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, INVENTORY, INGREDIENT, ORIGIN, PRODUCT_WEIGHT, KCAL ) values( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL, #{productCategory}, #{company}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{inventory}, #{ingredient}, #{origin}, #{productWeight}, #{kcal})

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_PRODUCT( FILE_NO, REF_PNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL ) values( SEQ_APNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_PNO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileLevel} )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_PRODUCT( FILE_NO, REF_PNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL ) values( SEQ_APNO.NEXTVAL, #{refPNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileLevel} )
mapper.update: update product set COMPANY = #{company}, PRICE = #{price}, INVENTORY = #{inventory}, INGREDIENT = #{ingredient}, ORIGIN = #{origin}, PRODUCT_WEIGHT = #{productWeight}, KCAL = #{kcal}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE, STATUS = 'Y' where PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
